description:
Summer vacation is over and the second semester has begun at Asahigaoka Branch School. Natsumi bursts in late after oversleeping on the first day, only to find the teacher absent and the other students in their seats looking bored. The students come up with different activities to kill time until the teacher arrives, but Renge`s tastes don`t quite match those of the older students...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meine Reiscracker sind zu Curry geworden
My Rice Crackers Turned Into Curry
せんべいがカレーになった
